attributes.action: Scrap or drastically reduce road fund licence charges on bio diesel cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government should reduce or preferably scrap vehicle excise duty on older vehicles converted to run on bio diesel as emissions are only 25% of normal diesels, also it does not use fossil diesel so reduces world oil useage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
